mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO dwd_industry_label (id, label_name, label_type, industry_chain_id, industry_chain_name, deleted,gmt_create,gmt_modify,create_by, update_by, data_source) VALUES
(#{do.id}, #{do.labelName}, #{do.labelType}, #{do.industryChainId}, #{do.industryChainName}, #{do.deleted}, #{do.gmtCreate}, #{do.gmtModify},#{do.createBy}, #{do.updateBy}, #{do.dataSource})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE label_name = values(label_name), label_type = values(label_type), industry_chain_id = values(industry_chain_id), industry_chain_name = values(industry_chain_name), deleted = VALUES(deleted), gmt_create = VALUES(gmt_create), gmt_modify = VALUES(gmt_modify), create_by = VALUES(create_by), update_by = VALUES(update_by)
